gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:48): jvdrean:problems with greenmail  
jvdrean - (16/09/2008 11:49): gpaul44: ah ?  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): I've wrote to skype  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): the problems  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:26:31] Paul Iosif Guralivu: Hello  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:26:40] … bad news about greenmail  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:26:49] … I don't think is helping us much  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:27:07] … :S  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:27:15] … I tested it  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:27:39] … for example:http://pastebin.com/m54ce280e  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:28:04] … I do receive the email in my alpine  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:28:10] … application(localy)  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:28:14] … but not in greenmail  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:28:48] … are you around ?  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:29:07] … btw, how does xwiki sends the notifications: using xmtp ?  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:29:10] … \*smpt  
gpaul44 - (16/09/2008 11:49): [12:29:12] … \*smtp
